text: Dudh Kosi (दुधकोशी नदी, Milk-Kosi River) is a river that flows from north to south in eastern Nepal. It is one of the rivers that joins to form Kosi River.raftnepal Dudh Kosi River (river of Mt. Everest) Expedition 2007Geographic's details Dudhkoshi River, Nepal The name 'Dudh Kosi' comes from Nepali word 'Dudh' which means milk, and 'kosi' which means river.
